00038 - (void)testSuccess {
00039   // This is just a test to ensure that you're building the unit tests properly.
00040   STAssertTrue(YES, @"Something is terribly, terribly wrong.");

00046 #pragma mark -
00047 #pragma mark Non-Retaining Collections
00048 
00055 
00056 - (void)testNonRetainingArray {
00057   NSMutableArray* array = NICreateNonRetainingArray();
00058   id testObject = [[NSArray alloc] init];
00059   NSUInteger initialRetainCount = [testObject retainCount];
00060 
00061   STAssertTrue(initialRetainCount > 0, @"Improper initial retain count");
00062 
00063   [array addObject:testObject];
00064   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount, @"Improper new retain count");
00065 
00066   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount,
00067                  @"Improper retain count after release");
00068 
00069   [array release];
00070   [testObject release];
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00075 - (void)testNonRetainingDictionary {
00076   NSMutableDictionary* dictionary = NICreateNonRetainingDictionary();
00077   id testObject = [[NSArray alloc] init];
00078   NSUInteger initialRetainCount = [testObject retainCount];
00079 
00080   STAssertTrue(initialRetainCount > 0, @"Improper initial retain count");
00081 
00082   [dictionary setObject:testObject forKey:@"obj"];
00083   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount, @"Improper new retain count");
00084 
00085   STAssertEquals([testObject retainCount], initialRetainCount,
00086                  @"Improper retain count after release");
00087 
00088   [dictionary release];
00089   [testObject release];
00090 }
00091

00095 #pragma mark -
00096 #pragma mark Empty Objects
00097 
00098 
00100 - (void)testIsArrayWithItems {
00101   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithItems(nil), @"nil should not be an array with items.");
00102 
00103   NSMutableArray* array = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
00104 
00105   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithItems(array), @"This array should not have any items.");
00106 
00107   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00108   STAssertTrue(!NIIsArrayWithItems(dictionary), @"This is not an array.");
00109 
00110   [array addObject:dictionary];
00111   STAssertTrue(NIIsArrayWithItems(array), @"This array should have items.");
00112 
00113   [array release];
00114   [dictionary release];
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00119 - (void)testIsSetWithItems {
00120   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithItems(nil), @"nil should not be a set with items.");
00121 
00122   NSMutableSet* set = [[NSMutableSet alloc] init];
00123 
00124   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithItems(set), @"This set should not have any items.");
00125 
00126   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00127   STAssertTrue(!NIIsSetWithItems(dictionary), @"This is not an set.");
00128 
00129   [set addObject:dictionary];
00130   STAssertTrue(NIIsSetWithItems(set), @"This set should have items.");
00131 
00132   [set release];
00133   [dictionary release];
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00138 - (void)testIsStringWithAnyText {
00139   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(nil), @"nil should not be a string with any text.");
00140 
00141   NSString* string = [[NSString alloc] init];
00142 
00143   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(string), @"This should be an empty string.");
00144 
00145   NSDictionary* dictionary = [[NSDictionary alloc] init];
00146   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(dictionary), @"This is not a string.");
00147 
00148   STAssertTrue(!NIIsStringWithAnyText(@""), @"This should be an empty string.");
00149   STAssertTrue(NIIsStringWithAnyText(@"three20"), @"This should be a string with text.");
00150 
00151   [string release];
00152   [dictionary release];
00153 }
